# Absorb Rune II (Spell)

[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]
**Level:** [[6th Level Bard Spells|Bard 6]], [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Magus Spells|Magus 6]], [[6th Level Occultist Spells|Occultist 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]
**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]
**Casting Time:** 1 standard action
**Components:** V, S, M (a white silk glove worth 25 gp)
**Range:** Touch
**Target:** One spell effect
**Duration:** Instantaneous plus 1 minute/level (see text)
**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)
**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)
**Source:** Adventurer's Guide, pg. 61

This spell functions like *[[Absorb Rune I (Spell)|absorb rune I]]*, but it can affect runes equivalent to a spell of 5th level or lower.
